emuInput.TitMainTitle: Nurse Bette Bournique taking height and weight of classmates Rosemary Bilik, Rosemary Bertinotti, and Anna Jane Bayer, posed in Mercy Hospital
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 28, 1964, pg. 3 reads: "First Step - Miss Bette Bournique is shown taking the height and weight of classmates, Miss Rosemary Bilik, Miss Rosemary Bertinotti and Miss Anna Jane Bayer (left to right) from Mercy Hospital. This is one of the first procedures for taking the diabetes test.  Student nurses from Mercy and Magee Hospitals will also do the vision testing at Health-O-Rama, to be held April 8,10,11 and 12 at the Savoy Ballroom, 2009 Centre Ave., Pittsburgh 19, Pa. - Harris Photo."
